name: shalour-sable
effect: Cures any major status ailment and confusion.
short_effect: Cures any major status ailment and confusion.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Shalour City’s famous shortbread. It can be used once to heal all the status conditions of a Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Shalour City’s famous shortbread. It can be used once to heal all the status conditions of a Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The Kalos region’s famous shortbread. It can be used to heal all the status conditions of a single Pokémon.
